title: Quatil's Vengeance
description:
The saga continues ... it's time for the Bandit King to strike back ...Nova, Brade and Slyis have been taken deep into the dark realm for Sirianda to wreak her vengeance on them. Meanwhile, Salin moves to seize the young Shinmahs first, for his own dark purposes. Adoy 
must
 rescue them before Sirianda or Salin reach them, but there is a problem. He has no idea where they are being held.The fate of Pangaea hangs in balance.Elsewhere, war is about to erupt. Having crossed the Iputa, the alliance prepares to sweep northward to the Nilgai. But they are unprepared for Quatil, the master of treachery and deceit. From experience, the Shinmahs know that Quatil's hidden hand 
must
 be at play, but they cannot see it. Little do the Shinmahs know what the Bandit King has in store for them.
author: Kevan Dinn
